title: System-Based Instructional Design Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of educational systems and digital tool utilization experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment leveraging learners' personal devices, emphasizing project-based collaborative learning

learning_goals: Analyze and explain key components of educational systems (physical environment, social interaction, instructional media, etc.).
Apply the information input-processing-output model to design real-world educational cases.
Gain experience operating a peer feedback system using digital collaboration tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
